arts.ttl: Strasbourg predicted XI v Lens: Mamadou Sarr out, Andrey Santos to start

arts.ttl: Messi included in Strasbourg squad for the first time
arts.sum: RC Strasbourg have confirmed that Rayane Messi (17) has been included in their squad to face RC Lens on Sunday afternoon in Ligue 1. The inclusion in the Alsatian club’s squad…

arts.ttl: Preview: Strasbourg vs. Lens - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Ligue 1 clash between Strasbourg and Lens, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Kevin Danso declared fit to play again for Lens after identifying heart issue
arts.sum: Lens centre-back Kevin Danso (26) has been declared fit to play first-team football once again by medical staff, the club has confirmed. The Austrian international defender had been sidelined after doctors…
